SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controller

Klasse FleventsAccountController

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controller.FleventsAccountController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/api/accounts") public class FleventsAccountController extends Object
This Class is the Controller for the REST-API path "/api/accounts". It an interface functionality regarding accounts.

  • Methodendetails

    • getAccountPreview

      @PostMapping("/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAccountPreview(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid LoginRequest loginRequest)
      Parameter:
      loginRequest - the email and password of the account to get the preview from
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the http status code

    • getnewToken

      @PostMapping("/refresh") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getnewToken(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Parameter:
      auth - The AuthenticationToken of the current logged-in User
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the http status code

    • logout

      @PostMapping("/logout") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity logout(@RequestBody LogoutRequest request)

    • getAccountInfo

      @GetMapping public AccountInformation getAccountInfo(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Returns the account extracted of the barer token
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      AccountInformation of the specified account

    • getBookedEvents

      @GetMapping("/booked-events") public List<EventInformation> getBookedEvents(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Returns the booked events of the account extracted of the barer token
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with the booked events of the given account

    • getManagedEvents

      @GetMapping("/managed-events") public List<EventInformation> getManagedEvents(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Returns the managed events of the account extracted of the barer token
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with the managed events of the given account

    • getExploreEvents

      @GetMapping("/explore-events") public List<EventInformation> getExploreEvents(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Returns a list of events to explore for the account extracted of the barer token.
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with events to explore for the specified account

    • getManagedOrganization

      @GetMapping("/managed-organizations") public List<OrganizationInformation> getManagedOrganization(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Get organizations where the account extracted of the barer token has the role "administrator".
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      List list with the organizations where the account is administrator

    • createAccount

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createAccount(@RequestBody FleventsAccount account)
      Creates a new account.
      Parameter:
      account - the account to be created
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the created account and the http status code

    • resetPassword

      @PostMapping("/reset-password") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity resetPassword(@RequestParam String email)
      Sends a mail with a link to reset the password for the account with the specified mail.
      Parameter:
      email - the email of the account where to reset the password
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the http status code and an optional error message.

    • editAccount

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity editAccount(@RequestBody FleventsAccount account, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Overwrites the account extracted of the barer token with the given account object.
      Parameter:
      account - the account object with the new information of the account
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the overwritten account and the http status code

    • deleteAccount

      @DeleteMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteAccount(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Deletes the account extracted of the barer token.
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity with the http status code and an optional error message
